basicInfo.name: Ariel
basicInfo.flavor: Ariel blesses anyone who serves the way of the light as she travels across various lands. \"Blessings unto those who serve the light!\

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Light's Judgment
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 120% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 75% chance to inflict Blind. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Magic Attack.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 44% Increased Miss Chance. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Dazzling Light
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 120% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Magic Attack.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 24%.

Passive.name: Blessing of God
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Burn Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Magic Damage Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants Burn Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Magic Damage Boost to 15%.

basicInfo.name: Ariel
